Flow.description: Form that shows up in Community to create a recruit
Flow.label: Recruit - Create a Recruit Form

fields.name: About_You_Screen_LEO_DT
fields.fieldText: LAW ENFORCEMENT EXPERIENCE

fields.name: Completion_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText:
YOUR INFORMATION HAS BEEN SUBMITTED

Thank you for your interest in {!Get_Recruiting_Demo_Setup_Record.Account__r.Name}. We appreciate you taking the time to provide your information.


You will receive an email confirmation and a QR code that you can use when speaking with a recruiter.


Please select "Finish".
